text: Arau yadi se'ibora janapadara adhibasisakale imana anilehemtena arau takbaraa aralambana karailehemtena tente niscaya ami sihamtara babe akasa arau prthiraira barakatasamuha unmukta karai dilohemtena, kintu sihamte micha pratipanna karaichila; seye ami sihamtara krtakarmara babe sihamtaka ataka karaicho
